result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael Charles Hess was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Attempt Theft-Movable Property <=$2500, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution to victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

Any conditions set forth by Agent.
Cooperation with unrelated case.

ADDRESS INFO for Michael Charles Hess
Current: 11883 Townhall Road, Fredrick, WI 54837   (Effective: 05-12-2015)
Prior: 1420 Wisconsin 25, Barron County Jail, Barron, WI 54812 United States

10:31 Defendant Michael Charles Hess in court with attorney Liesl E. Nelson.  Defendant Michael Charles Hess in custody.  Sean Edward Froelich appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Froelich files an amended information. Guilty to amended information charge. 1 year probation concurrent with any current probation and cooperation with an unrelated case. No restitution.  Nelson and Def agree.  Plea Questionnaire and Waiver of Rights form is filed with the court; court reviews with Def.  Constitutional rights explained to defendant. Exam'd re: understanding of law, penalty and rights. Def pleas guilty to amended charge in amended information; Nelson stipualtes to a factual basis.   COURT ACCEPTS PLEA, FINDS DEF FREELY, INTELLIGENTLY, KNOWINGLY & UNDERSTANDINGLY MADE AND WAIVES CONSTITUTIONAL RIGHTS. Court finds and adjudicates Def guilty of amended charged in amended information. Froelich and Nelson address sentencing. Def addresses the Court.  Court: S/W 1 year probation; concurrent with any probation currently on. conditions: court costs, cooperation with unrelated case, any conditions set forth by agent.  Appeal rights are given to the defendant.
Plea hearing at 05-12-2015 09:45 am.
Pre-trial conference at 04-27-2015 02:15 pm.
Pre-trial conference on February 2, 2015 at 04:00 pm.
Status conference on January 9, 2015 at 03:00 pm.
